subject: Avalanches
Freestyle Skiing
lead_paragraph: A Freeride World Tour event in Kappl in the Austrian Alps was canceled after the second starter set off an avalanche, from which he escaped with bruised ribs and legs.
snippet: A Freeride World Tour event in Kappl in the Austrian Alps was canceled after the second starter set off an avalanche, from which he escaped with bruised ribs and legs.
